steps.name: user is in the home page

elements.name: There should be a "departure" field on a search form

steps.name: departure field should be available
user is in the home page

elements.name: There should be a "return" field on a search form

steps.name: return field should be available
user is in the home page

elements.name: Check success message for available seats

steps.name: user selects a departure date "July"
user selects a return date "December (two years from now)"
click on search button
a success message for available seats should be displayed
user is in the home page

elements.name: Check message for no available seats

steps.name: user selects a departure date "July"
user selects a return date "July (two years from now)"
click on search button
a message for no available seats should be displayed

name: Basic Search Flow
description:
As a MarsAir Sales Director (Mark)
  I want potential customers to be able to search for flights to Mars
  So that they see what trips are available

steps.name: user is in the home page

elements.name: return can not be less than 1 year from the departure date

steps.name: user selects a departure date 'July'
user selects a return date 'July'
click on search button
an invalid return date message should be displayed
user is in the home page

elements.name: return can not be less than 1 year from the departure date

steps.name: user selects a departure date 'July'
user selects a return date 'December'
click on search button
an invalid return date message should be displayed
user is in the home page

elements.name: return can not be less than 1 year from the departure date

steps.name: user selects a departure date 'December'
user selects a return date 'December'
click on search button
an invalid return date message should be displayed
user is in the home page

elements.name: return can not be less than 1 year from the departure date

user selects a return date 'July (next year)'
click on search button
an invalid return date message should be displayed
user is in the home page

name: Invalid Return Dates
description:
As a MarsAir Sales Director (Mark)
  I want to prevent potential customers from searching for invalid trips
  So that they dont waste time, and book valid ones

steps.name: user is in the home page

elements.name: User is in the main page so clicking the MarsAir logo on the top left should refresh the page

steps.name: user clicks on the MarsAir logo on the top left from home
user should be taken to home page
user is in the home page

elements.name: User is in the results page so clicking the MarsAir logo on the top left should go to the home page

steps.name: user selects a departure date "July"
user selects a return date "July (two years from now)"
click on search button
user clicks on the MarsAir logo on the top left from search results page
user should be taken to home page

name: Link to Home Page
description:
As a MarsAir Sales Director (Mark)
  I want potential customers to be able to go back to the flight search from anywhere on the site
  So that they are guided towards booking trips

steps.name: user is in the home page

elements.name: User uses a valid code

steps.name: user selects a departure date "July"
user selects a return date "December (two years from now)"
user informs a promotional code 'AF1-FJK-427'
click on search button
the search result should have a message 'Promotional code AF1-FJK-427 used: 10% discount!'

name: Promotional Codes
description:
As a MarsAir Sales Director (Mark)
  I want to distribute promotional codes to customers
  So that they get discounts and are more tempted to purchase tickets
